name: Where is the princess?
description:
A short game about a knight that can deflect a demon's magic bullets and his quest for the princess.

This is a short game I did for a school final project. 

Controls are:

-WASD for the movement

-Left mouse button to deflect.  Note: Enemies can't be defeated by normal slash from your sword. You have to deflect the enemy's magic bullets to inflict damage on them.

-Space Bar to use focus mode. You will enter a slow mo state.

-TAB to pause and view controls.

Thanks to 0x72  for the assets https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset
